title: Following Family Rules
content: Just as Heavenly Father gives us commandments to help us choose the right, your family may have some other rules to keep you safe and happy.
Your family may want to set rules about:
“Do” rules help you and your family members choose the right. Some
pray and read your scriptures daily.
“Do not” rules help you and your family members avoid bad or dangerous situations. Some
take harmful things into your body.
watch or listen to inappropriate media.
Ask your parents if you can discuss which rules are best for your family. Then ask what you can do to help each other follow your family rules.
